scenes.background: You decided to let [Monica] and [Bob] handle the urgent task.
scenes.description: 'Monica and I can manage, but if you change your mind, just let us know.' He gives you a reassuring nod.

options.text: Thanks, Bob. I'll disengage and trust you both.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation by stepping back, but empathy and emotional perception could be improved.

options.text: I appreciate it, but I want to stay involved to ensure everything goes smoothly.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and emotional perception by wanting to stay involved, but it may affect your self-regulation.

options.text: Alright, I'll help for a bit longer, but let's coordinate the specifics first.
options.analysis: You balance your time off with work demands, showing good social skills, but emotional perception could be improved.
